briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Generic Diclofenac Epolamine Acute Pain Due to Minor Ankle Sprain
officialTitle: Randomized, Double-Blind, Multiple-Center, Placebo-Controlled Study Comparing the Safety and Efficacy of Generic Diclofenac Epolamine to FlectorÂ® Patch in the Treatment of Acute Pain Due to Minor Ankle Sprain
summary: To demonstrate the therapeutic efficacy of a generic diclofenac epolamine patch against Flector patch in the treatment of pain in subjects with minor ankle sprain

primaryOutcome.measure: Visual Analogue Scale (VAS) Scores at Baseline and Post Treatment
